title: Create download link in the app

requirements.summary: Update the Android download button in the app footer to link to an actual download URL instead of the placeholder '#android-download'
acceptanceCriteria: The Android download button in the footer navigates to a valid URL when clicked
The link can point to either a Play Store URL or a direct APK download location
The button remains visually consistent with the existing footer design

file_operations.description: Replace the placeholder '#android-download' href in the Android download button with a valid download URL (Play Store or direct APK link). Preserve the existing button styling, Download icon, and footer layout including the CEO attribution and caffeine.ai credit.
